enchantments.name: Protection
enchantments.description: Reduces incoming damage from most sources.

enchantments.name: Fire Protection
enchantments.description: Reduces fire and lava damage and burn duration.

enchantments.name: Feather Falling
enchantments.description: Reduces fall damage.

enchantments.name: Blast Protection
enchantments.description: Reduces damage and knockback from explosions.

enchantments.name: Projectile Protection
enchantments.description: Reduces damage from projectiles.

enchantments.name: Respiration
enchantments.description: Extends underwater breathing time.

enchantments.name: Aqua Affinity
enchantments.description: Increases underwater mining speed.

enchantments.name: Thorns
enchantments.description: Reflects damage back to attackers.

enchantments.name: Depth Strider
enchantments.description: Increases underwater movement speed.

enchantments.name: Frost Walker
enchantments.description: Turns water beneath the player into ice.

enchantments.name: Soul Speed
enchantments.description: Increases speed on soul sand and soul soil.

enchantments.name: Swift Sneak
enchantments.description: Increases movement speed while crouching.

enchantments.name: Curse of Binding
enchantments.description: Prevents removal of the item once worn.

enchantments.name: Curse of Vanishing
enchantments.description: Causes the item to vanish upon death.

enchantments.name: Sharpness
enchantments.description: Increases melee damage against all mobs.

enchantments.name: Smite
enchantments.description: Increases melee damage against undead mobs.

enchantments.name: Bane of Arthropods
enchantments.description: Increases melee damage against arthropod mobs.

enchantments.name: Knockback
enchantments.description: Increases knockback dealt by melee attacks.

enchantments.name: Fire Aspect
enchantments.description: Sets targets on fire when hit.

enchantments.name: Looting
enchantments.description: Increases loot dropped by mobs.

enchantments.name: Sweeping Edge
enchantments.description: Increases damage of sweep attacks.

enchantments.name: Efficiency
enchantments.description: Increases mining speed.

enchantments.name: Silk Touch
enchantments.description: Causes blocks to drop themselves.

enchantments.name: Unbreaking
enchantments.description: Grants a chance to avoid durability reduction.

enchantments.name: Fortune
enchantments.description: Increases block drops.

enchantments.name: Power
enchantments.description: Increases bow damage.

enchantments.name: Punch
enchantments.description: Increases bow knockback.

enchantments.name: Flame
enchantments.description: Sets arrows on fire.

enchantments.name: Infinity
enchantments.description: Prevents arrows from being consumed when fired.

enchantments.name: Luck of the Sea
enchantments.description: Improves treasure fishing loot.

enchantments.name: Lure
enchantments.description: Decreases time to catch fish.

enchantments.name: Loyalty
enchantments.description: Returns thrown tridents.

enchantments.name: Impaling
enchantments.description: Deals extra damage to aquatic mobs.

enchantments.name: Riptide
enchantments.description: Launches the player when throwing a trident in water or rain.

enchantments.name: Channeling
enchantments.description: Summons lightning when striking a mob during thunderstorms.

enchantments.name: Multishot
enchantments.description: Fires three arrows at once.

enchantments.name: Quick Charge
enchantments.description: Decreases crossbow reload time.

enchantments.name: Piercing
enchantments.description: Causes arrows to pass through multiple entities.

enchantments.name: Mending
enchantments.description: Repairs the item when collecting experience orbs.

enchantments.name: Breach
enchantments.description: Reduces target armor, available in newer versions.

enchantments.name: Density
enchantments.description: Increases trident damage while falling.

enchantments.name: Wind Burst
enchantments.description: Pushes enemies away when the wearer takes damage.
